data.title: Captain John Pendleton Thomas, I
data.meta_description: Genealogy for Captain John Pendleton Thomas, I (1761 - 1832)  family tree on Geni, with over 260 million profiles of ancestors and living relatives.
data.text:
GEDCOM Note

Unsure on military service. There are several of name John Thomas who served in Rev. War. One I chose seemed to fit best. Haven't found birthdates on any or a then current residence in Mississippi when applying for retirement pay.

GEDCOM Note
